website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically pleasing rest mat, perfect for placing on daycare cots.
pros: Included pillow is firm and comfortable
Attached fleece blanket is large and warm
Safe for light machine wash in cold water

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: The mat is really thin. Would be ok to use on a couch for nap time, definitely not on the floor. I’ve attached pictures to compare to Wildkin ROBOT nap mat. They were the same price. Although the Fox design was perfect for a gift but will be returning it to buy a Wildkin.
customer_reviews.author: Henny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old loves this! Its soft and the pillow is fluffier than a typical toddler pillow. The design is super cute and I think it will be just perfect for daycare-- its all one piece so he can't misplace the pillow/blanket etc.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk, dont waste your money. The fabric is covered in big holes because of how many plastic things they put in it to hold it together. The fabric is frayed and i just took it out of the box! The bottom “mat” is thinner than than the top blanket and does not have a nice feel at all. The top blanket is soft but thats all it has going for it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: While super adorable, I was surprised it wasn't long enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat for my 3.5 year old for pre-k. While super adorable, I was surprised it wasn't long enough for her. She is "tall" for her age but not that tall. Be sure to check the length with your child's height before ordering! Otherwise, the pillow has remained fluffy through weekly washes and the blanket is thin, but enough for napping with her security "blankie". I would definitely buy again, but for a smaller kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: mkp

customer_reviews.title: Not 45 inches in length!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a mat that is truly 45 inches, this is not the product for you. The 45 inch in length measurement includes the bulk of the pillow. In other words, they measured it going over the middle of the pillow. If you measure the mat lengthwise, it is only about 42 inches. See pic. This was a disappointment to me, as my son is very tall. Otherwise, the product is as advertised. Nice pillow, nice blanket, and would wash up easily in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: NaturalMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great little nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Super soft fleece blanket, soft cotton-ish pillow and bass. I was concerned because it came in a small box, but when I got it out and unrolled, I’m quite happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but I wouldn’t  purchase if I were you. I actually want a refund!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about purchasing this for my 1 year old son ; however extremely disappointed after the first wash. It has an excessive amount of lint that is created from one part of the cover to another. Very annoying as I spend a great amount of time tackling it with a lint roller. Not to mention the fact that my baby comes home with lint and fuzz balls all over his hair and clothes after sleeping in it at school. And yes- I only wash it by itself so the item is definitely the culprit!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Mom

customer_reviews.title: She has gotten too tall for it and after weekly washings it is getting a little fuzzy now but I feel its very cure and nice fabric. It is perfect for a child under ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mat for my daughter for pre-k for 2 years. She has gotten too tall for it and after weekly washings it is getting a little fuzzy now but I feel its very cure and nice fabric. It is perfect for a child under 3 (my daughter is 4 now) it is thin, more like sleeping on a blanket but she has never minded (when you weigh 25-30 lbs you can sleep on anything anyways) and she doesn't even mind its short for her. I just thought for the new school year I will get her a longer one. I am happy for the price how much use I got from it.
customer_reviews.author: Diandra Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Soft and Cozy Nap Mat.......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little nap mat. I love that the fleece blanket is stitched along one side, as it keeps a moving child mostly covered. The cotton of the underpad and pillow is a nice quality and the fleece is snuggly and soft. I purchased it for a 2 year old and there is plenty of room to grow. We use it on a fold up traveling toddler bed and it fits perfectly. It can also just be used on the floor or sofa for napping. Oh, and who doesn't love Snoopy and Woodstock? Great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my preschool daughters first year so she didn’t have any issues at nap time. She’s able to get it out and use it with no issues and put it up. The teachers do help her roll it up because she can’t do it too well but she’s 3 so that’s expected. But this mat is so cute and not too thick so they don’t get hot when sleeping on it. We’ve washed it a few times and no issues with it falling apart either, it’s still looks the same as it did when we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sleep mat for school!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is starting Kindergarten Summer School and they asked for the kiddos to bring a sleep mat or towel. I saw this on Amazon and it is perfect! I couldn't imagine a sleep mat or towel being comfortable on the hard floor. This is has a light weight bottom and the attached cover is a light weight super soft fabric. The attached headreat is padded and serves as a great pillow. It rolls up nicely and stays secure with velcro. It has a small carrying handle but we just put it in her backpack. One thing I like is that it isn't too bulky so it fits in with being a "sleep mat" if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight nap blanket.
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is using this for nap time at Montessori school. It’s easy for her to fold and roll by herself. The pillow and blanket are super soft and the blanket is light weight. The pad part is better than average and this would be great if it is used on top of a sleep pad or cot but not very cushioned if on the bare floor. I wash it every week and it has held up very well ( I’ve had it for a month now). No bunching in the pillow after washing. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Our House

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bed roll. She uses it for naps at preschool. The blanket is very soft and it seems to be good quality. She can roll it up herself. I have washed it once with no issues. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because I wish the pillow portion had removable inside to remove before washing. I'm worried the pillow won't hold up to weekly washing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: No padding/ very thin
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing for daycare then don't bother. There is absolutely no padding. The price for this is high for what you get. Cheaply made and no padding except in the pillow. I would't even use this for a sleepover on a carpeted floor because what is the point? Throw a blanket your already own over your child and it would be the same thing except you wouldn't have spent any money. Will be sending this back asap. Cute but not worth it. Much better products out there for around the same price.
customer_reviews.author: A. RIOJAS

customer_reviews.title: Suggly and linty, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: My little ones loves his mat. It easier to ensure daycare doesn't lose than and sheet and cover. Plus the pillow really has held up. Please note you should definitely wash it alone! Tons of lint, tons. I spent the first few washes pulling off the little lint balls and since I gave. Not horrible but goes from new to linty fast. But mainly it the warm blanket and my son loves it. So it serves it's purpose and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: The design is super cute, it comes with a tag so you ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 monther to take with her to daycare, she's not a pillow sleeper, but she fell right to sleep on this nap mat. The design is super cute, it comes with a tag so you can write your little one's name on it, and it folds up super easy. Easy to wash, took about two tries in the dryer on the delicate setting to dry fully. The pillow isn't removable, so I was a little apprehensive to stick it in the washer with the fear of it warping. We're warp free, and its holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: MamaFarron

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!  My little guy loves!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this for day care! I wasn't sure he would actually sleep on it but I was pleasantly surprised! Pillow is very full and blanket that is attached super soft. The "mat" isn't very thick, I expected more cushion but great for an all in one for daycare needs!
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a nap mat for his day care nap. I bought this one because it showed a high cotton content, and very little polyester. He falls to sleep in a jiffy with his head on the pillow, his knees tucked up under him, and his rear end in the air. And he stays asleep for 3 hours! (More if they'd let him!). I highly recommend it. My only concern about it was that it lost a lot of fuzzy stuff in the washing machine the first few times I washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This little combo is so ideal for my little guys school. He’s always been a blankey kind of boy but I’ve had so much reservation sending him to school with his one and only. He has no issues snuggling up with this blanket and laying on the pillow. He def has it made compared to the other kids. I was it weekly and hang it to dry. Only thing I have noticed is that the stuffing in the pillow needs to get disbursed after a wash, and I’m assuming it won’t last more than a year because it’s just like teddy bear infill.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scheid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a preschooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a preschooler... this is exactly what my daughter needed to go on top of the meds provided by her preschool. She loves packing it up to take with her and then it’s easy to roll up and attach to her backpack when it’s time to bring it home. We tried to stay away from characters, so the little fox is just enough to make it whimsical without having a cartoonish look to it, the fabric is soft and the blanket extend far enough over that she has plenty to cover up with yet still rolls up nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: World travelin family

customer_reviews.title: sweet and soft
customer_reviews.text: love this. The blanket attached is so so so soft. The colors are spot on to the picture. My only complaint is that the pillow is not removable so the stuffing in the pillow has to be washed every time. Also, the fabric on the pillow (only) got those little pills on it after only 2 washings. Not a big deal because I have a fabric shaver, but it would be annoying if you didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Gomila

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Helps with getting my toddler day naps. Bought it for the nursery where they lay it out on small cots. On it's own it does not provide sufficient cushion, which is fine, because I simply wanted a hygienic cover with a blanket and pillow all in one, and this is exactly wht i wanted. Pillow is comfortable, blanket is soft. After washing it once a week for the past 24 weeks, colors on pillow do fade, but we sitll love it. No change to pillow quality or softness of the blanket. Teachers liked it so much they asked where i got it so they could get it for their own kids. Would definitley repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: meerkat

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Just got the napmat. Haven’t used it. Pros: cute design, soft blanket Cons: superduperhyper thin, “pillow” doesn’t have support at all, small size overall, tag looks cheaply made as well as handle. Idea: make a velcro opening on the top part of the pillow and insert removable travel memory foam pillow. Buy a portable crib memory foam mattress topper with a waterproof sheet and attach with velcro to each corner on the bottom part (where kids lay down) Don’t know if I’ll return it. Happy holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Cute, high quality and easy to clean. My son loves it - when I lay it on the floor to fold it after washing/drying it, he often comes over to lay on it and snuggle the blanket. He doesn’t use the pillow yet but I love having it connected and all one piece for when he is a little older and will use the pillow. (Updated: He uses the pillow and blanket now and sleeps so cozy, and it’s pretty much the cutest thing I’ve ever seen!)
customer_reviews.author: LeaH1109

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy napmat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this napmat about a year ago after my daughter started a summer camp that required one. She loves Snoopy and was delighted to get a napmat with such a lovely design. The mat has survived well over the past year, the only issue currently is the velcro has worn out but after a year of weekly washings, I'm not surprised at that. Overall, I'm very happy with this mat and would recommend it to anyone who has a Snoopy fan in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Koppel

customer_reviews.title: CAME WITH RIP IN IT
customer_reviews.text: pretty disappointed. I needed this in a hurry, the day I got it, i took it to get monogrammed. Did not notice until after that there was a rip in it. Since it had already been monogrammed, I obviously could not return it, so hopefully my baby will not completely tear this thing up and maybe get some use out of it before I have to replace. Will definitely order a better brand nap mat in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Adorable comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this little nap mat. It fits my pre-k kiddo perfectly. It has a nice pillow and there’s plenty of room with the blanket. As a mom sending her little one off to school - I rest easy knowing he’s comfortable. If there are tile floors in the classroom I would still want something thicker underneath, FYI. We use it for movie night at home, too! So adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Brought the nap mat for my 2 yr. old grandson. Light weight, soft, and cute design. The size is just right for him. The item is a little thin but I put the mat on my bed which makes it comfortable. Don't think it would be comfortable on a hard surface though. Overall satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Missthing72

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft, but no padding
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is super soft and the pillow is a nice size. The pattern is super cute, though it's pretty purple, whereas in the pics it looks blue and gray. The "pad" is really thin. I can't even call it a pad. It's basically just a thin blanket on the bottom. So if you just need something to go on a kids nap cot at school, it's probably fine. But if you wanted actual padding for the floor or anything, then you have to put something under it still.
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent Blanket
customer_reviews.text: My kid absolutely loves this blanket! She uses it for daycare and it comes home every Friday for a wash. It is not too terrible to wash. I toss it in with her other blankets/similar items then dry it on low. It definitely has some pilling going on and has faded some over the couple months we've been using it. I wouldn't call it a high quality product, but I also wouldn't call it low quality. It's somewhere in the middle. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jenna Lake

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy (well, so I'm told)
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying a nap mat with a non-removable pillow, but the reviews said it was easy to clean. They were right! It dries pretty quickly after it goes through the washing machine. And it's great quality, super soft, and adorable. I leave the plastic folded nap mat at her school, and I just bring this one home to wash once a week. We get a lot of comments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Beeay

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this nap map for her daycare and my daughter absolutely loves it. It's a little bit too warm it the A/C is not on and you have to give it a couple of washes until the fabric stops shredding fluff. Not sure I would recommend it to someone who suffers allergies because of the dust the fabric creates after washing.
customer_reviews.author: rossc264

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: It is a great nap mat. Very cute, and soft. Only complaint was my daughter was not fitting under blanket. Her feet comes out and she has to sleep in a particular way to be under blanket. All nap mats which have attached blanket has same issue, so we just carried extra blanket. Other than that, we totally liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Varma

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was extremely satisfied with this sleep mat. My daughter loved the colors and was happy to climb in and take a nap without prompting. However, over time (about 2 months of use) the pilling got increasingly bad as we washed the mat after each week. Also, there isn’t enough padding in the pillow section to really be considered a pillow. It has flattened out over the last 2 months and my daughter uses a pillow over it for support.
customer_reviews.author: Leo24

customer_reviews.title: Soft With A Built-in Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Our preschooler loved laying her head on the unicorn's head and she learned how to fold her mat quickly so it would go in her cubby. She's very tall for her age so all nap mats are short if she stretches out, but since she curls up to sleep, the length is not a problem. She just loved this.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Cute napper set
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little napper for my tot at preschool. Easy to store and carry and cute design. My only issue is I wish the pillow was an insert. I am concerned with me washing it wvery week the pillow will get deformed and not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkdiggler

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this nap mat! It's super soft even after washing. My son loves that the blanket is attached so it doesn't fall off when he's sleeping. I like how it has velcro straps on the bottom for east carrying. My only complaint is the pillow gets lumpy after you wash it.
customer_reviews.author: MomofDragons

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and super super soft blanket
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super super soft blanket. The padding on the bottom could be thicker, softer, but overall, it's a great nap mat. As another reviewer mentioned, there are TONS of little tags to clip off, and finding them all can be a pain, and I don't think they are all necessary. Otherwise, this is a great travel nap mat.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Great for 3yo pre k nap time she likes the softness and it’s cute. Serves its purpose. I do wash it weekly, so the stuffing in the pillow is kinda balled up but you just fluff it around and it still works. Some piling from wash and once per week use
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat matches my daughter's nursery bedding set so I had to get it. We use it at home for naps and she loves it! It is very soft. I like how the pillow and mat are attached together and the blanket is attached to the mat on one side. It rolls up nicely for storage. My daughter is 1.5 years old and when I tell her it's nap time she runs into her room and grabs her mat from under the crib because she's excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: tfoster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft, needs more stuffing in pillow
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is very minimal. Barely any stuffing so if my daughter lays down too fast she will hurt her head on the ground. But it's pretty. May just cut it open and add more stuffing and sew it back up. Rolls up nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold up to regular use
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and my daughter loves it but after one week of use there is terrible pilling. The majority it on the pillow but the interior mat is doing the same. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year later and we're still using this little mat! My son loves it and carried it in to his daycare himself. The carry handle is carry convenient and makes it easy to juggle along with diaper bags, backpacks, etc. Very durable and the pillow hasn't flattened out too much.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Allison

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute but the material is kind of thin. Seems like it could tear easily. It’s an okay product but not worth what I paid for it. Mine also came in with the packaging ripped a little which caused a black smudge to get on the pillow, and I was denied an exchange or replacement for it.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great choice out of all the options!
customer_reviews.text: I really stressed over the selection of my son's first napmat. There were so many options that were much more expensive than this one, so I was afraid I'd get something cheap. But I read lots of reviews and people had such good things to say about this one, and many of the expensive ones had some complaints. I am so pleased with this one!! Don't waste your money paying more. The pillow on this one is nice, the blanket is soft, it washes well. And my little guy loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Decided to Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase after reading reviews about poor quality and construction. I’m so glad bought this nap mat anyway!! It’s super cute and really soft, and I’m happy to report that it is still holding up well after daily use multiple washes!
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for nap time at preschool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves pillows and always gets cold in anything under 75 degrees so this was perfect for her naps at preschool. It folds up nicely with velcro, has a little cushion to it, and the pillow is just the right height. It washes nicely and looks good as new! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Glacier1102

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, and the fleece blanket is nice and soft. I wish the pillow was removable however because it’s fairly thin / not fully stuffed. If it was removable I could put a different pillow in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old daughter loves it. As soon as I pull it out, she tries to help me unfold it so she can lay down. She immediately knows it’s nap time lol. It’s soft and the pillow is comfy. We’ve had it for about two weeks and I’ve washed it twice and it’s still soft and holding up. She uses it on a cot at both daycare and home.
customer_reviews.author: rachambers

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approves
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and soft, but the velcro to keep it rolled sticks to other items in the wash and the pillow has gotten lumpy. That being said, my son loves it. It is perfect for his cot at daycare
customer_reviews.author: officegrl3

customer_reviews.title: Pillow insert clumps up over washes.
customer_reviews.text: Pillow filler does not separate and the poly foam clumps up over washes now after 5 washes I could feel each ball of foam filler. That wouldn’t be comfortable to lay your head on.
customer_reviews.author: Vegasmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute design.
customer_reviews.text: Mat is very cute. For 2-3 yr old Blankie is very cozy Cons: I wish pillow would come out for washing, but it is attached and now does not feel as nice as before Fuzzy things after washing several times It is ok for the money
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this nap mat 3 years ago for my then-one-year-old son to use at day care, and it has held up well after many washings and three years of use! We are just now replacing it because the pillow is looking a bit lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sleeping mat
customer_reviews.text: Like others have pointed out, mat is not thick. Little more cushioning would have been nice. Pillow is nice. Daughter loves the mat and Snoopy. Because we send the mat to daycare, we wash it every week. One of the two Velcro straps has gone bad (we always use low setting in dryer). Bottom part of the mat has started to pill. Still good though.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty but quality is so so...
customer_reviews.text: Mat looks good, but I have serious questions about quality. The length of the product is small, barely covers my 4 year old. The blanket is microfiber throw material which my daughter didn't liked. We returned it and bought different one and is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: giskindra

customer_reviews.title: cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and still went ahead and purchased this nap mat. It is cute and soft. I like that it rolls up and has velcro straps to keep in place and also a tag to mark their name. However, the pillow was hardly stuffed at all and the mat itself is pretty thin.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and helpful invention
customer_reviews.text: I get all the compliments about this awesome invention when I drop my son off at daycare. It's much better quality than expected and is sooo cozy and soft. The top layer is a different material than the bottom, but washes up well and works well for all seasons. It's like a sleeping bag without the zipper. We love it! It rolls up nicely to fit in his cubby when not in use :)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Brossard

customer_reviews.title: Super soft comfort of Snoopy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat for a foster child that lived with me when he began pre-k. He loved it! It is really soft and warm, and it is easy to clean by just throwing it into the washing machine. Thank y’all for an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, held up through many washes & kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good quality. Although we have purchased a more plusher, larger nap mats for the same price- we liked this fox mat. It is a bit shorter than other mats we have purchased as well, but a 4 year old has no problems using it daily. Has held up through many many washes on the sanitize cycle.
customer_reviews.author: hellomynameisjodi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nap roll for preschool!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for nap time at preschool and he loves it! It is a little thin but he lays it on top of a mat so it's perfect. I've also washed this about a 100 times and it's still holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The print was cute, but after a few washes it looks very old. For the price you’d expect it to be better. Spend a few more bucks and get the quality that will last when you have to wash it every Friday. I don’t recommend... try Targets Pillowfort material. It’s the only one that’s held up during weekly washes yet still looks amazing. I think it’s cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: bschipper

customer_reviews.title: Love Soft Snoopy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help My son to sleep better at daycare. He refused to take a nap for a while and the soft Snoopy helps a lot!! I am glad it helps him to sleep better and happier.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Well made-perfect for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, well made. My granddaughter loves this nap map and we use it daily for daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 3 stars, it’s soft, however the mat isn’t very thick and also the pillow on the one I got for my 19 month old daughter is like flat and there is like no stuffing
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bartle

customer_reviews.title: Needs more Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my children to have at daycare. There is one thing I wish they were a little more thicker and had more cushion. Other than that for the price they work well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Webb Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought before my daughter started school in August. Now March. Still going strong! Granted, both my kids quit napping before two. Both love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little nap mat. It is great for school and bringing out for play time and nap time fun at home. My only issue with it is that I wish the pillow was detachable. After the first wash it bunched all up and the fabric faded significantly. The batting is not as thick as I thought it would be, but it is sufficient. My son loves the attached blanket. Very esay to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: penrysmom

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: The filling is very thin and flimsy. Seems expensive for the quality of materials used. This is more like a gently padded blanket than a mat. We bought one from a local store for half the price that was much more substantial. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: K McDonald

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for. I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. I bought this based on price and it feels CHEAP. My son is on his 3rd month of using it, I must admit I don't launder it every week, yet it is pilling all over. In addition, it claimed to be appropriate for up to 5 years of age. My son is an average 4 year old and is way too tall for this thing. The only reason I gave it 2 stars was because I didn't expect it to be a high quality product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Mama

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat 16 months ago and had to search my order history to write a review. This mat has been USED and it still is in wonderful condition. It’s been through the washer and dryer several several times and still the pillow is big and fluffy. I anticipated needing to replace this sooner but it’s still in too good of condition to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Martin

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mat for my daughter to take to daycare and the colors are all very cute but the pillow part is chunky and not full of material.
customer_reviews.author: nikki r.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, and perfect size for preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: I looked far and wide for a comfortable nap mat for my son when he started preschool this year. They were either much too small, especially in length, or made of flimsy, crappy material. This nap mat is soft and plush, lightweight, but not flimsy, and the perfect length and size (my son is 3, average height). It rolls up nicely and has a small velcro strap to secure it. Fits perfectly in his little cubby at school, and so far, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LeanneA

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cute little mat. Not much padding but it serves the purpose we needed for which was just for preschool quiet time. I like that it is pretty gender neutral so my boys and girls can use it without complaining it's "for a boy," or "for a girl"
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Liz Guilbeau

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, but my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot thinner than I expected. It is basically just a thin piece of fabric for them to lay on, and a thin fleece blanket to cover them. However, my girls absolutely love these. They laid down on them as soon as I opened these, and my two year old kept saying “cuuute!” I personally don’t care for the product, although the design is cute, but my kids love it, so that’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Mirranda Higbee

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfy, Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers and pre-schoolers. We use it for naptime at home and for crib bedding when we travel. The pillow has flattened a bit, but not a big deal as my kids don't really need pillows yet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Flood

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! We use at daycare and my kiddo cuddles up and sleep well in it according to his teacher! Easy to wash and fun for our kiddo. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: B. Brew

customer_reviews.title: Really cute nap mat for preschooler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this nap mat. She uses it at her preschool program and it has stood up really well (even after quite a few washes). The blanket itself is super snuggley and soft and the pillow is quite fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: Wraps up easily and fits into my little ones backpack to carry to and from school. She loves the design. It’s soft and easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: C. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and snuggly! It’s very soft and easy to fold/wash. My 4 year old son needed a nap roll for preschool so I found this one and bought it. He actually takes naps with it (something he hasn’t done in 2.5 years) so it certainly gets the job done! I love that I can just toss it in the washing machine and it cleans easily and without any fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander W.

customer_reviews.title: He gets good naps
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this at daycare and now it is the only thing he will nap in. We have to order one for our house so he can nap on weekends. It is just right for a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the quality for the price. and - SNOOPY!
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking my son to a new daycare that required bringing bedding for naptime (was provided for me previously at the in-home centers I used). I love the quality of the cotton and the softness of the blanket. Love the color palette and the Snoopy graphic! ONLY complaint, I can not figure out how to roll it up to match up with the Velcro to save my lie!
customer_reviews.author: ATXangel

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son to take to daycare for nap time. The print is adorable but the quality is pretty poor. After the third wash, it now looks like it’s a year old and the pillow stuffing is all weird and uneven. Couple of spots the seams are unraveling already. I’ve only had for about two months.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Ok nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Cute mat and easy to use/clean, but began to pull after several washes. Also pillow is not removable so quickly became misshapen with multiple washes. That said, my kid loves it and doesn’t care about the pilling or lumpy pillow.
customer_reviews.author: thorg

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Very soft. I would give 5 stars, but this has no padding on the bottom so it's not going to be comfortable when my kid has to use it to lay on the floor at school. I don't think any of these types have much padding though, so we didn't have a lot of options. Love the Charlie Brown theme on this one.
customer_reviews.author: MHem

customer_reviews.title: NEED to get this for your baby!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS nap time sleeper is the cutest thing I’ve ever seen!! It folds up and has a handle to carry back and forth to daycare and it’s so light. The snoopy and Woodstock picture is so cute! I would defs order another!!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Sboopy nap mat. I use this for my 14 month old son at daycare and haven't had any complaints thus far. The top attached blanket is fleece, but the bottom padded mat and pillow are cotton, sheet-like material. He'll probably be able to use it a few years before he out grows it, if it lasts with extended washing.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This washes great and the pillow doesnt lose its shape. It's very soft and easy to carry around. It is a little thin but my ome year old doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bray

customer_reviews.title: Washable
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for daycare and even likes to use it at home. It is soft and comfortable. It is also very easy to clean, and I love the fact that it has a pillow that is attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but sheds
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her napmat but when I wash it, it sheds so theres little white stuff all over my clothes. It fits in her bookbag which I like and it folds up easily for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: EYIM

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable material.
customer_reviews.text: After multiple washings, the material is still fluffy and soft. Adorable design and easy to launder; I just recommend closing the Velcro to prevent snagging any clothes. It is easy to roll up and doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: tmc1218

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for daycare and it has worked wonderfully! We bring it home every Friday and wash it and have had no issues with it at all! The blanket is super soft, and the pillow has maintained its shape with all of the washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: cute for daycare/nap time. It is rather warm, so may be too hot for hot summer. Overall, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The is the greatest thing for daycare. Easy to wash and carry around... I don’t have to worry about sheets and blankets with this all in one.
customer_reviews.author: GibbsWife

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The product did not have a mat to lay on. It’s a thin layer of cotton and very uncomfortable for my child to nap during nap time at daycare. Did not use and had to buy another product with a thicker mat for comfort. Does not comply with regulations of safety hazards of daycare cause it was not made of a protective barrier on bottom. It’s all cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Garza

customer_reviews.title: it was nice but wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: the pillow was too large and it didn't seem roomy enough but the granddaughter liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This is way too small for the ages advertised and the blanket isnt really big enough to be cozy for naptime. purchased for my 4 year old who is actually short for his age.Gave to a friend for their 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: OD

customer_reviews.title: Cute nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Great nap mat for my daughter. After about a year or so it does show wear and tear as we do wash it weekly. The pillow has lost its durability, but still hanging on strong!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Feldhaus

customer_reviews.title: Durable but thin
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s soft and comfortable for my son. Durable enough I think his little brother will get use out of it. I will say it’s best used if school/daycare has cots for the kids. It seems a touch thin for floor sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Collard

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's cute
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's cute, comfy, and my daughter loves it because its easy for her to roll it up and roll it back out. The only thing is my daughter is 4 but a tall one and her little feet hang off of it but she manages.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect so soft and the blanket is a little bigger then the mat so they can cuddle with it better perfect my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lambs & Ivy Little Explorer Nap Mat, Blue/Gray/Orange
product_meta.description: Color:Little ExplorerYour little one will be cozy in this soft nap mat and pillow combo. The blanket has a light blue background with woodland animals including foxes, bears, and squirrels. The pillow features a cute little fox with the words "Little Explorer" on a dark blue background. This nap mat is easy to roll up with a Velcro-style closure and the handle makes it a cinch to carry.
feature_bullets: Write your child's name on the name label and you can rest assured your little one will have his favorite nap mat for day care, grandma's house, or wherever his travels take him.
Measures 21.5" x 45" (including the pillow) and is a poly/cotton blend.
Machine wash cold with like colors. Gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron on lowest setting as needed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars978 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
